DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine a possible implication of CD21, CD35 and CD55 in the pathogenesis of age-related macular degeneration. The aim is to asses a difference in expression rates of these factors on AMD-patients and a healthy control group.
DOC.brief_title: Implication of CD35, CD21 and CD55 in Exudative Age-related Macular Degeneration
DOC.criteria: Man and women over 18 years old Filled out informed consent Diagnosis of nonexudative/ exudative age related macular degeneneration Inherited retinal diseases Other acquired retinal/ macular Missing informed consent
